name: MONEY SHOT (The_NaN)
description:
Made For: PolyJam 2022

Time: 44 h

Team size: 3

Theme: Duality

Software used: Unreal Engine 4.27

Controls: 

 WSAD/Arrows - Move

Shift - Shoot

Space - Jump

Esc - Close Window

Spend your money wisely! In this game your wealth indicates both your health points and amount of ammo. Battle crypto, NFTs and overpower their boss.
